title: The Rise of David Henderson: Urban Hero
summary: David Henderson discovers his superpowers while volunteering, battles a crisis, and saves his city over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: David Henderson entdeckt seine Superkräfte während des Ehrenamts, bekämpft eine Krise und rettet innerhalb einer Woche seine Stadt.
summaryDutch: David Henderson ontdekt zijn superkrachten tijdens het vrijwilligerswerk, bestrijdt een crisis en redt zijn stad in de loop van een week.
summaryFrench: David Henderson découvre ses superpouvoirs en faisant du bénévolat, lutte contre une crise et sauve sa ville en l'espèce d'une semaine.

story.text: David Henderson, while tutoring at a local school, accidentally discovers his ability to manipulate time when he narrowly avoids a falling bookshelf.
Excited by his new powers but unsure how to control them, David practices late into the night. He manages to reverse a few seconds, amazed and energetic.
David decides to use his powers for good. He stops a potential accident involving a runaway dog and a busy street, feeling triumphant.
Rumors of a 'time-bending hero' begin to circulate, and David feels the weight of his new responsibility. He spends the day helping elders, bringing peace to their day.
A crisis emerges as a chemical spill threatens the city's water supply. David uses his powers to rewind time and avert the disaster before it occurs.
The city hails the mysterious hero. David, happy but overwhelmed, keeps his identity a secret and enjoys a quiet day.
Reflecting on the week, David commits to using his powers to support and protect his community, feeling ready for whatever comes next.

ending: And thus, David Henderson began his journey as a true superhero, promising to guard the flow of time and safety of his beloved city.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility; use your abilities to make a positive impact on the world.
